data.name: Security Services Center of Excellence
data.description: Accion's Security Services Center of Excellence is a comprehensive cybersecurity practice providing end-to-end security services across Cloud Security, Generative AI Security, Application Security, DevSecOps, and Governance Risk & Compliance (GRC). The CoE delivers enterprise-grade security solutions including risk assessment and management, security testing and audits, compliance frameworks adherence (NIST, CIS, CAF, HIPAA, PCI-DSS), threat analysis and management, business continuity planning, and advanced security services. With 30+ core consultants, 200+ security resources globally, and industry certifications including PCI DSS, HIPAA, CMMI v2.0 L3, and ISO standards, the CoE enables organizations to achieve robust security posture, regulatory compliance, and risk mitigation.

data.businessValue: Accion's Security Services CoE delivers comprehensive security value through risk mitigation, threat impact reduction, regulatory compliance, and security posture enhancement. The CoE enables organizations to achieve robust security frameworks, reduced security incidents, improved compliance posture, enhanced threat detection and response capabilities, and cost-effective security operations. Key benefits include shortened time to market with security-by-design, reduced operational and maintenance costs, simplified security processes, and strengthened security foundations for business growth.
